name: Ketchup
overview: Ketchup is a puzzle-solving game. The main character of the game is the ruler of the state turned into a tomato by Lord Warnhol. His task is to escape from the dungeons of the castle. In each chamber there are objects hindering and facilitating the task, such as locking bars and barrels, teleporters, floppy disk (disables the forcefield) or bombs (destroys wall). The players must acquire indicated items and reach the doors to the next chamber before the time runs out.
